name: Athena Recherche

name: La Carbonerie
project-desc: La Carbonerie is specialized in the manufacture of BioCarbons resulting from the pyrolysis of 100% vegetable biomass of first quality. We offer a wide range of products of impeccable quality from this range of BioCarbons

name: Naoden
project-desc: Naoden offers a modular solution for the valorisation of biomass waste for an efficient production of biogas. Naoden uses gasification, a thermochemical process, which converts solid fuels into a fuel called syngas and a sustainable carbon capture component, biochar.
project-desc copy: Naoden offers a modular solution for the valorisation of biomass waste for an efficient production of biogas. Naoden uses gasification, a thermochemical process, which converts solid fuels into a fuel called syngas and a sustainable carbon capture component, biochar.
sdgs: GOAL 9: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure",GOAL 8: Decent Work and Economic Growth,GOAL 13: Climate Action,GOAL 6: Clean Water and Sanitation

name: Recnorec
project-desc: Recnorec welcomes and transforms plastics that have no recycling solution into an original, solid, healthy and multiform material

name: Wattalps
project-desc: WATTALPS conçoit, assemble et commercialise des batteries modulaires et haute performance pour les engins industriels (construction, manutention, agriculture, maritime, logistique...). Nous avons une solution innovante de maitrise de la température des cellules lithium-ions qui nous permet de garantir haute performance et grande durée de vie. Notre approche modulaire nous permet de réutiliser des batteries en seconde vie dans des applications moins exigeantes.
project-desc copy: WATTALPS conçoit, assemble et commercialise des batteries modulaires et haute performance pour les engins industriels (construction, manutention, agriculture, maritime, logistique...). Nous avons une solution innovante de maitrise de la température des cellules lithium-ions qui nous permet de garantir haute performance et grande durée de vie. Notre approche modulaire nous permet de réutiliser des batteries en seconde vie dans des applications moins exigeantes.
sdgs: GOAL 7: Affordable and Clean Energy,"GOAL 9: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure",GOAL 11: Sustainable Cities and Communities,GOAL 12: Responsible Consumption and Production,GOAL 13: Climate Action
fonctional unit: mechanical kWh available on construction site
